item.title: The Multifaceted Benefits of Rutin in Managing Diabetes
item.description: Unveiling Rutin: A Natural Ally Against Diabetes Diabetes, a global health challenge, continues to affect millions worldwide with its array of complications. In the search for effective treatments, natural compounds have garnered significant attention. One such compound, rutin, a flavonoid found in various plants like Fagopyrum esculentum, Ruta graveolens, and Sophora japonica, has shown promising potential in managing diabetes. Ahmad Ghorbani’s comprehensive review, “Mechanisms of antidiabetic effects of flavonoid rutin” in Biomedicine & Pharmacotherapy, 2017, delves into the multifaceted role of rutin in combating diabetes-related challenges.
